conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'board' AND operation == 'archive' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'kind'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'board' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'board' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'board' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'boardColumn' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'boardColumn' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardColumn' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'boardColumn' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnType'
IF resource == 'boardColumn' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'boardColumn' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'boardGroup' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'boardGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'boardGroup' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardGroup' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF resource == 'boardGroup' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'addUpdate' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'addUpdate' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'changeColumnValue' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'changeColumnValue' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'changeColumnValue' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'changeColumnValue' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'changeMultipleColumnValues' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'changeMultipleColumnValues' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'changeMultipleColumnValues' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnValues'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'boardItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'boardItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getByColumnValue' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getByColumnValue' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getByColumnValue' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnValue'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getByColumnValue' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'getByColumnValue' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'move' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF operation == 'move' AND resource == 'boardItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'boardItem' AND operation == 'move' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
